name: Pork Chops With Potato Wedges and Green Beans
notes: Fig jam can be substituted with any other jam. Instead of condensed broth, you can use real broth (1/4 cup). Instead of parmesan cheese for the green beans you could add almonds.

instructions.description: Trim the tips of green beans.
Peel baby potatoes and cut into wedges.
Dice two or three cloves of garlic.
In frying pan, add some olive oil, pre-heat medium-high and add 2 pork chops.
Salt and pepper pork chops and cook 5 minutes each side.
In a bowl, add some olive oil and add potato wedges and mix.
Add some minced garlic, garlic salt, salt, pepper and paprika to potato wedges.
Add potatoes to air fryer tray, set air fryer to 400 F and cook 10 minutes, stirring half-way through.
Remove tray, add 2 cups of water to InstantPot and add green beans directly into water.
Pressure cook for 0 minutes. Quick release and remove beans and drain.
Remove water from InstantPot, turn on saute mode low heat.
Add some butter and melt, add green beans and parmesan cheese, and saute for a short time.
In a clean frying pan, add a tiny bit of olive oil and some chopped garlic.
Cook the garlic for a minute or so. Add 1/4 cup water, condensed chicken broth, fig jam.
Cook the pork chop topping for 3 minutes until thicker.
Serve pork chops, green beans, potatoes and top chops with sauce.
